scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install && npm audit fix && rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json && npm install --prefix frontend && npm audit fix --force --prefix frontend && rm -rf admin/node_modules admin/package-lock.json && npm install --prefix admin && npm audit fix --force --prefix admin && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix admin
